name: Larrikin of SPLORR!!
description:
Yer the Larrikin! Look it up if you want!

Yer job is to find the Macguffin. What's a macguffin? Look that up, too.

On the way, you need to fight things, find weapons and shields, and drink potions.

Good luck.

Deliberate Design Decisions:

  • this game does not protect you from overhealing. you got max health and drink a potion? have at it! potion gone... health the same! hope it was tasty!

Source Code: https://github.com/playdeezgames/larrikin-of-splorr
